For more information, please refer to our [contributor's guide](https://oss-generic.github.io/process/).

Welcome to **HypeBot**, your *Java-powered*, super-excited chatbot assistant! HypeBot helps you **crush your tasks**, keep up with your deadlines, and schedule events like a pro! Let‚Äôs get those tasks DONE and have a blast doing it! üí™üî•
- [x]   **Deadlines**: Tasks with a due date‚Äîlet‚Äôs beat the clock! ‚è∞
- [x]   **Events**: Schedule events with start and end times. Get hyped! üéâ
Celebrate those victories or update your progress as needed!
Lost in the task list? No problem‚ÄîHypeBot will help you find tasks with specific keywords!
Got a packed day? HypeBot can find all tasks and events happening on a specific date.
If you don't want to look at a task anymore, you shouldn't have to!
Here‚Äôs how you can start rocking your to-do list with HypeBot!
Download the executable JAR file from [here](https://github.com/youngseopark05/ip/releases/tag/A-Release)
and run the command below in the folder you downloaded the JAR file to get HypeBot **_HOT AND RUNNING!_**
// Enter this on the terminal, you should be in the directory of where HypeBot was downloaded!
There's nothing wrong with asking for help!
- To find out everything that HypeBot can do for YOU, type `help`
Just tell HypeBot what you need to do, and it‚Äôll handle the rest!
- To add a **ToDo** type task, type in: `todo {task_name}`
- To add a **Deadline** type task, type in: `deadline {task_name} /{due_date in yyyy-mm-dd}`
- To add an **Event** type task, type in:
4. **List all your tasks as one tasklist**
Wanna see all your tasks in a single view? HypeBot's got you covered!
- To view all your added tasks as one tasklist, type in: `list`
Here's some of HypeBot's functionalities to help you stay on TOP of things!
Ready to celebrate a win? Mark your tasks as complete like a champion!
- To mark a task as complete, type in: `mark {task_number_in_list}
- To unmark a task as complete, type in: `unmark {task_number_in_list}`
Can‚Äôt find a task? No worries, HypeBot‚Äôs got you!
- To search for tasks containing keywords, type in: `find {keyword1} {keyword2} ...`
HypeBot will search for tasks matching ANY of the keywords, so you can search for multiple if you want to!
What‚Äôs happening on a specific day? Let HypeBot tell you!
- To search for tasks happening on a certain day, type in: `happening {search_date in yyyy-mm-dd}`
No time to put in all those pesky dates? No worries! HypeBot will figure out the dates for you if you type in
`today`, `tomorrow`, and any days of the week, where a date entry should be! (You'll still have to put in a time
Say "BYE BYE BYE!" faster than you can say NSYNC when you don't need a task anymore!
- To delete a task, type in: `delete {task_number_in_list}`
- To delete ALL your tasks, type in: `deleteall`
## So you think you know how to use HypeBot? ‚è∞
Once you become a familiar user, you might want to start getting your tasks done at even BLAZING speeds - HypeBot's got
Use any of the following shortcuts for an even FASTER experience - be done with your tasks like clockwork!
Here's some more date-related shortcuts too:
> The only way to do great work is to love what you do." ‚Äî Let‚Äôs get that task list in shape! üí™
With HypeBot, every task feels like a victory lap! üèÅ Let‚Äôs CRUSH those goals together! üí•

* Represents the {@code AddCommand} created whenever user prompts to add a {@link Task}
* to the {@link Tasklist} of a {@link HypeBot}.

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'todo'},
* Takes in a {@link Task} to add to a {@link Tasklist}
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link Tasklist} to add a {@link Task},
* and returns a {@link UiResponse} from the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link UiCli}
* clarifying that the {@link Task} was successfully added.
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return {@link UiResponse} clarifying that the {@link Task} was successfully added.
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {
* Represents the {@code ByeCommand} created when user is ready to exit.

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'bye'}
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link StorageManager} to {@code save()}
* the current {@link Tasklist} to the user's local computer, then triggers
* the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link UiCli} to return a {@link UiResponse}
* that the {@link HypeBot}'s {@link Tasklist} are being saved to user.

*

If {@link File} to save not found, triggers {@link UiCli} to return a
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return Appropriate {@link UiResponse} depending on success of {@link Tasklist}
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {
* Represents the base {@code Command} class which all {@code Command}s
* parsed by the {@link CommandParser} inherit from.
* Represents the base method implemented by all children of {@code Command}.

*

Specifies manipulations on taken-in {@link Tasklist}, {@link UiCli}, and {@link StorageManager}
* associated with a {@link HypeBot} according to type of {@code Command}.
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return The appropriate {@link UiResponse} according to type of {@code Command}.
public abstract UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager);
* Represents the {@code DeleteAllCommand} created that deletes all

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'deleteall'}
* command typed in by the user.
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link Tasklist} to {@code deleteall()}
* {@link Task}s, then triggers {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link UiCli} to return
* a {@link UiResponse} clarifying that all {@link Task}s were deleted.
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return {@link UiResponse} clarifying that all {@link Task}s were successfully deleted.
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {
* Represents the {@code DeleteCommand} that deletes a {@link Task} from the {@link Tasklist}

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'delete'},
* Takes in an {@code int} index (0-indexed) indicating the position
* of a {@link Task} to delete from the {@link Tasklist} and
* @param idx 0-indexed index of {@link Task} to delete from {@link Tasklist}.
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link Tasklist} to {@code delete()}
* the {@link Task} with the chosen {@code indexOfTaskToDelete}, then triggers
* {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link UiCli} to return a{@link UiResponse}
* clarifying that chosen {@link Task} was successfully deleted.
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return {@link UiResponse} clarifying that chosen {@link Task} was successfully deleted.
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {
* Represents the {@code FindCommand} that searches for {@link Task}s in the {@link Tasklist}
* of a {@link HypeBot} matching a regex {@link Pattern} of keywords.

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'find'}
* Takes in a search query in the form of a regex {@link Pattern} containing keywords
* to find {@link Task}s with any keywords in its {@code name} in the
* {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link Tasklist}, and creates a new {@code FindCommand}.
* @param searchQuery Regex {@link Pattern} search query containing keywords to
*                    search for in each {@link Task}'s {@code name}.
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link Tasklist} to create a new {@link Tasklist} of
* any {@link Task}s matching the {@code searchQuery}, then triggers {@link HypeBot}-associated
* {@link UiCli} to return a {@link UiResponse} showing the new {@link Tasklist}.
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return {@link UiResponse} showing the new {@link Tasklist} containing {@link Task}s
* @throws NoSuchElementException If {@code Tasklist} is empty or there are no {@link Task}s that
*      *                         have a name with any of the keywords.
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager)
* Represents the {@code GreetCommand} created to simulate the start of a {@link HypeBot}

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'start'}

* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return {@link UiResponse} showing the new {@link Tasklist} containing {@link Task}s
*         that happen on this {@code FindCommand}'s {@code searchDate}.
* @throws NoSuchElementException If {@code Tasklist} is empty or there are no {@link Task}s that
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager)
* Represents the {@code HelpCommand} created to list out possible commands to

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'help'}

public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {

public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} cannot successfully parse any
/** User-entered command word that did not correspond to any known {@link Command}. */
* Takes in the unknown command keyword and creates a new {@code UnknownCommand}.
* @param command Unknown command keyword entered by user, from {@link CommandParser}.
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated{@link UiCli} to return a {@link UiResponse}

* Represents the {@code UnmarkCommand} that unmarks a {@link Task} from the {@link Tasklist}
* of a {@link HypeBot} and deems it incomplete.

*

Instantiated when the {@link CommandParser} successfully parses a {@code 'unmark'},
/** Index of {@link Task} to unmark and deem incomplete. */
* Takes in an {@code int} index (0-indexed) indicating the position
* of a {@link Task} to mark incomplete from the {@link Tasklist} and
* @param idx 0-indexed index of {@link Task} to mark incomplete from {@link Tasklist}.
* Triggers the {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link Tasklist} to {@code unmark()}
* the {@link Task} with the chosen {@code indexOfTaskToUnmark}, then triggers
* {@link HypeBot}-associated {@link UiCli} to return a {@link UiResponse}
* showing that chosen {@link Task} was successfully marked incomplete.
* @param uiCli          {@link UiCli} that deals with text user interacts with.
* @return {@link UiResponse} clarifying that chosen {@link Task} was successfully unmarked.
public UiResponse execute(Tasklist tasks, UiCli uiCli, StorageManager storageManager) {

* @param errorIndex Index of data where error occurred.

* Takes in the parsed data that lead to the error, and index of user input that

public abstract class HypeBotDateTimeParseException extends DateTimeParseException {
* Takes in an error message, parsed data that lead to error, and index of user
* input that caused error and creates a new {@code HypeBotDateTimeParseException}.
* @param message Error message to be outputted to user interface.
* @param parsedData User entered data or tasks.txt data that lead to error.
* @param errorIndex Index of data where error occurred.
public HypeBotDateTimeParseException(String message, CharSequence parsedData, int errorIndex) {
* Represents an {@code DatePassedException} thrown when the {@link LocalDate}
* due date of a {@link Deadline} or {@link LocalDateTime} event time of an
* {@link Event} object has passed, thus cannot create a {@link Task} with such details.
* Takes in an error message and creates a new {@code DatePassedException}.
* @param message Error message to be outputted to user interface.
* Represents an {@code IllegalEventTimesException} thrown when the
* {@link LocalDateTime} start time and event time of an {@link Event} object are
* not in a plausible chronological order, thus cannot create a {@link Task}
* Creates a new {@code IllegalEventTimesException} with the appropriate error message.
* Represents an {@code IllegalTaskStatusException} thrown when the
* marked indicator of a {@link Task} saved in a {@link File} retrieved by the
* Takes in an error message and creates a new {@code IllegalTaskStatusException}.
* @param message Error message to be outputted to user interface.
* Represents an {@code IllegalTaskTypeException} thrown when the
* type indicator of a {@link Task} saved in a {@link File} retrieved by the
* {@link StorageManager} is not T, D, or E ({@link ToDo}, {@link Deadline}, or {@link Event}).
* Takes in an error message and creates a new {@code IllegalTaskTypeException}.
* @param message Error message to be outputted to user interface.
